member.name: M:Nehawu.MembershipRegistration.Backend.Swagger.SwaggerOperationFilter.GetSingleAttributeOfMemberOrDeclaringTypeOrDefault``1(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copied from ABP Tries to gets an of attribute defined for a class member and it's declaring type including inherited attributes. Returns default value if it's not declared at all.
